prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with a whimsical design and a playful expression.
I want a cute Pokemon that has large eyes and a unique hairstyle.
Generate a small Pokemon that embodies the essence of dreams and mystery.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a doll with a magical aura and enchanting colors.
Imagine a psychic creature that is often found in urban areas, with a charming personality.
Design a Pokemon with a round body and distinctive heart-shaped features.
Show me a Pokemon that captivates with its innocent appearance and psychic powers.
